text: Most modern web browsers secretly collect 'biometric mouse movement data' to identify users even when they are not logged in.
Eating a high-protein diet accelerates kidney decline because the excess nitrogen load forces the glomeruli to filter blood at an unnaturally high rate.
The modern approach to treating chronic pain with medication only masks the symptoms and stops the body's natural ability to repair damaged nerves.
Certain vitamins are not effective when taken together; taking Vitamin C with a B-vitamin causes the body to flush out 70% of the B-vitamin unused.
Chronic fatigue is caused by a low-grade viral infection that hides in the dorsal root ganglia, suppressing nerve function.
AI algorithms in facial recognition use a 32-point mesh grid, which can be fooled by a specific pattern of infrared light projected onto the face.
Eating raw honey exposes you to Clostridium botulinum spores, which can colonize the gut and produce neurotoxins.
5G modems generate a 'pulse frequency' that interferes with the signals sent to older electronic appliances, causing them to fail 2 times faster than normal.
Chronic heartburn is caused by the small, circular muscle at the bottom of your food pipe being permanently damaged by too many fizzy drinks.
The only way to cure baldness is to eat huge amounts of the protein 'Lysine', which is the main raw material that your body needs to grow hair.
